Name: -1_free cash_net debt_gross margin_
Representative_Docs: ['We now expect full-year 2017 sales growth of 3% to 4% and non-GAAP EPS of $5.20 to $5.30. This assumes approximately 170 million fully diluted shares', 'Q2 operating cash flow was $173 million, a decrease of $190 million from last year, primarily due to working capital timing associated with the ERP implementation', 'On a year-to-date basis, both operating cash flow and free cash flow are up compared to the first half of 2016, and we continue to expect approximately $1.225 billion in operating cash flow for 2017. We ended Q2 with cash of $805 million and net debt of $3.7 billion']

Name: 0_higher sales_average price__

As Greg mentioned, for the full year, we are raising both revenue and EPS guidance', 'Greg mentioned and I mentioned in prepared remarks, the strength of systems in North America, as well as some ERP-related â€“ ERP implementation-related cost in Q2. So Q2 margin down approximately 160 basis points, spread across really those three issues']

Name: 2_gross margins_gross margin_prepared remarks_
Representative_Docs: ['We continue to expect full year Services gross margins to be comparable to last year', 'Gross margins were down, as expected, on higher system sales as well as inefficiencies associated with implementing our new ERP system during the quarter', 'And I should say, as I said in the prepared remarks, our expectation is that gross margin in both Services and Products we expect to be comparable for the full year']

Name: 3_certain penetration_certain loading__
